name: Snowfall: Eat Your Cookies!
description:
Dodge the snowfall and eat the freshly baked cookie to keep yourself warm and avoid damage from the unrelenting cold winds.

If the game doesn't load try turning off ad blocker.

  • Move left and right: Arrow keys; A and D.
  • Jump: Space bar; Up arrow key; W.
  • Pause: B
  • Restart: R
  • Close game on desktop: ESC

Feedback is appreciated, specially in regards to game difficulty. What is your highest score?

Win 10 points for every cookie. Chains work as multipliers for scoring points. Start a chain of combos for every 3 cookies. Get 1 hit point back for every 3 cookies. Get 1 shield for every 2 chains. Lose a chain and combo by getting hit by a snow flake. Taking damage from freezing winds doesn't break combos and chains. 

Prototype made as the final project for Harvard's CS50 online course Introduction to Computer Science.  Written in lua using love2d v11.4.

Character art made using Stable Diffusion 1.5 with AUTOMATIC1111 Webui's text2img and Inpaint.

I uploaded the original output as a screenshot.

Prompt: cartoon,one small green character chasing ((one cookie)) in the night sky while it is snowing, Negative prompt: animal ears

SFX from:

  • https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
  • https://leohpaz.itch.io/rpg-essentials-sfx-free
